attributes.action: Revert the Snickers bar name back to Marathon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Marathon was a British tradition, it was made with British nuts, nougat and chocolate. Then one day in the late 80's it was changed, and with it went not only a name but part of the British identity.

I propose the Prime Minister changes the name back to Marathon and in turn will allow this great nation to have a long lost part of its history return

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
